item.title: k3s Cluster on setup master and node
item.description: For some IoT setups a need a k3s cluster running. To make it spread and to add more nodes a installed the k3s Master on my firewall running a small atom processor. But wanted to run the nodes on raspberry or rock nodes to handle the load. Then by using labels on nodes I want to apply different workloads on the nodes. Pre So before installing k3s master. I had my pihole running on port 80 and that did not work that well.
